scripts.dev: concurrently "tsc --watch" "cd dist && next build && node src/functions/routeHandler.js"
scripts.prenext:build: mkdir -vp dist && cp -R serverless.yml package.json next.config.js node_modules webpack.config.js dist/ && cp -R src/public/static dist/ && tsc
scripts.build:staging: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=staging "npm run next:build && cd dist && serverless --stage staging package"
scripts.build:production: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run next:build && serverless package"
scripts.emulate:staging: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=staging "npm run next:build && cd dist && serverless --stage staging offline"
scripts.emulate:production: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run next:build && serverless offline"
scripts.deploy:staging: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=staging "npm run build:staging && cd dist && serverless deploy --stage staging -v --package .serverless"
scripts.deployf:staging: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=staging "npm run build:staging && cd dist && serverless deploy --stage staging -v --package .serverless -f server"
scripts.deploy:production: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build:production && serverless deploy -v --package .serverless"
